Package ohos.wifi.p2p

Class WifiP2pController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pController

  • public final class WifiP2pController
extends Object
    Provides methods for managing the Wi-Fi peer-to-peer (P2P) service.

    The management operations include initializing the Wi-Fi P2P service, discovering peer services and devices, creating a P2P group, and connecting to a specified peer device.

    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      static int GROUP_INFO_REQUEST
      Indicates the request for the Wi-Fi P2P group information.
      static int NETWORK_INFO_REQUEST
      Indicates the request for the Wi-Fi P2P network information.

        public static final int DEVICE_INFO_REQUEST
        Indicates the request for the Wi-Fi P2P device information.

        Your application can use requestP2pInfo(int,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) to request the Wi-Fi P2P device information.

      • getInstance

        public static WifiP2pController getInstance​(Context context)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException
        Obtains a WifiP2pController instance.

        WifiP2pController is a singleton class.

        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context of the caller.
        Returns:
        Returns the WifiP2pController instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the caller is missing required context.
        Since:
        3

      • init

        public IRemoteObject init​(EventRunner eventRunner,
                          WifiP2pCallback callback)
                   throws RemoteException
        Initializes the P2P controller and enables Wi-Fi P2P capabilities.

        This method is used to establish a communication channel between devices. Before calling other Wi-Fi P2P-related methods, you must call this method first. Otherwise, calling other methods will fail.

        Parameters:
        eventRunner - Indicates the event runner that receives callbacks.
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the P2P information.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is initialized failed.
        Since:
        3

      • discoverDevices

        public void discoverDevices​(WifiP2pCallback callback)
                     throws RemoteException
        Discovers Wi-Fi P2P devices.

        The discovery result is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the discovery result.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3

      • stopDeviceDiscovery

        public void stopDeviceDiscovery​(WifiP2pCallback callback)
                         throws RemoteException
        Stops discovering Wi-Fi P2P devices.

        The result of stopping the discovery is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the result of stopping the discovery.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3

      • createGroup

        public void createGroup​(WifiP2pConfig wifiP2pConfig,
                        WifiP2pCallback callback)
                 throws RemoteException
        Creates a P2P group.

        The P2P group creation result is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        wifiP2pConfig - Indicates the P2P configuration used to create the P2P group.
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the P2P group creation result.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3

      • removeGroup

        public void removeGroup​(WifiP2pCallback callback)
                 throws RemoteException
        Removes a P2P group.

        The P2P group removal result is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the P2P group removal result.

      • requestP2pInfo

        public void requestP2pInfo​(int requestType,
                           WifiP2pCallback callback)
                    throws RemoteException
        Requests P2P information.

        The P2P information is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        requestType - Indicates the request type, which can be GROUP_INFO_REQUEST, DEVICE_INFO_REQUEST, NETWORK_INFO_REQUEST or DEVICE_LIST_REQUEST.
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the P2P information.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3

      • connect

        public void connect​(WifiP2pConfig wifiP2pConfig,
                    WifiP2pCallback callback)
             throws RemoteException
        Initiates a P2P connection to a device with the specified configuration.

        The result of initiating the P2P connection is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        wifiP2pConfig - Indicates the P2P configuration of the device to connect to.
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the result of initiating the P2P connection.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3

      • cancelConnect

        public void cancelConnect​(WifiP2pCallback callback)
                   throws RemoteException
        Cancels a P2P connection that has been initiated.

        The cancellation result is notified by the callback passed by your application.

        Before calling this method, ensure that the WifiP2pController object has been initialized using the init(ohos.eventhandler.EventRunner,ohos.wifi.p2p.WifiP2pCallback) method.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback that is invoked to notify the cancellation result.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Throws this exception if the WifiP2pController object is not initialized.
        Since:
        3
